name: Space Recon | the unkown emergency signal
name_original: Space Recon | the unkown emergency signal
description:
The Space Recon intercepts a distress signal and follows it to a remote planet. In orbit is a badly damaged space station. 

In this exercise I built a so-called second part of Space Recon. 

The game supports controllers and keyboards.

There are 3 levels in total. The levels are announced when the goal is reached. In the last level, two doors must be unlocked. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The WebGL caused problems in the main screen. So I left it out until I understood what the problem was.
